params.recovery: Address which can recover the fid. Set to zero to disable recovery.

params.sig: EIP-712 Register signature signed by the to address.

VERSION().notice: Contract version specified in the Farcaster protocol version scheme.

price().notice: Calculate the total price to register, equal to 1 storage unit.

price(uint256).notice: Calculate the total price to register, including additional storage.

register(address).notice: Register a new Farcaster ID (fid) to the caller. The caller must not have an fid.

register(address,uint256).notice: Register a new Farcaster ID (fid) to the caller and rent additional storage.         The caller must not have an fid.

registerFor(address,address,uint256,byte.notice: Register a new Farcaster ID (fid) to any address. A signed message from the address         must be provided which approves both the to and the recovery. The address must not         have an fid.

Register a new Farcaster ID (fid) to any address and rent additional storage.         A signed message from the address must be provided which approves both the to         and the recovery. The address must not have an fid.

setStorageRegistry(address).notice: Set the StorageRegistry address. Only callable by owner.
